Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes the town/village of East Rochester, county of Monroe, to appoint Karol Hughes to the position of full-time police officer
Summary: Authorizes the town/village of East Rochester, county of Monroe, to appoint Karol Hughes to the position of full-time police officer.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the town/village of East Rochester, county of Monroe to hire Karol Hughes to fill a full-time competitive position with the town/village of East Rochester police department
